name: Save Playlists
description: Extension to save any playlist by right clicking on a playlist > Save Playlist.

name: Auto Skip
description: Auto Skip Certain Songs such as remixes, acoustics etc. Toggle in Profile menu.

name: Play Next
description: Add the option to context menu to add the track to the top of the queue.

name: Volume Percentage
description: Add the current Volume Percentage to the Volume Bar.
